data.text: @dmcintyrepga Hola David, the connection between flights is made with enough time , if all your flights are under the same reservation the baggage will fly from origin to destiny, in case you need any assistance, please contact our desk agents at the airport in order to help you. Kind regards

@kkristalblue comes if necessary, the conditions of the voucher will be made even more flexible, but for now we could not tell you something different. Otherwise, please inform us as we have mentioned you via your direct message query. 
Kind regards,

@kkristalblue Hola Norma. Every effort will be made to ensure that all customers can use the voucher, and in exceptional cases that if the voucher is unable for being used due punctual / greater cause, we will assess the situation,  We are adapting to the situation and when the time /1
@mkovalenko800 Hola Michael. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number (075...). https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@beasleygreen Hola Beasley, we're deeply sorry for the inconvenience. If the last flight in your itinerary was operated by us, please contact our baggage center by phone for further assistance. The number in Spain is (+34) 900 111 342 . We remain at your disposal
@crisperan Hola Cristóbal, envíanos un mensaje directo https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6 con los detalles acerca de tu consulta para que podamos orientarte de forma correcta. Saludos.
@alvarohmaliaga Hola Alvaro, the 2438948 isn't a valid refund reference. Please send us a DM with your full name, booking code and ticket number (075...) https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@DannyMMorris Hola Danny, sorry for the inconvenience. Could you please send us a DM with the flight date, time and number? If you don't have such info, we need your booking code, full name and ticket number https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@PrimroseCarr You're welcome :)
@harneswapnil7 Sorry. We're already in touch with the passenger. Best regards
@PrimroseCarr Unfortunately, in this case, you need to wait until we plan the summer routes for 2023. This should happen around march 2023. We remain at your disposal
@kkristalblue Thanks. We've just replied the DMs

@PrimroseCarr There aren't direct flights available, but you can find flight options when using the Multiple Legs flight search engine. You need to search for flights from London to Madrid, then from Madrid to Barcelona, and do the same for the return: https://t.co/vJKkNE4Zwj

urls.title: Travel to multiple destinations - Iberia
urls.description: Book flights to multiple destinations using the Iberia online search engine, which allows you to personalise your itinerary flight by flight for greater comfort.

data.text: @PrimroseCarr Hola, through our website https://t.co/m6fyDz8alC, you should be able to book flights from UK to Spain within the next 355 days. So, right now, you'll only find flights until september 7 2023

urls.title: IBERIA.COM en United States - the best prices for Iberia flights
urls.description: Check the offers of cheap flights from the United States to more than 300 Iberia destinations in Spain, Europe, America and Asia, and reserve it at the best price

data.text: @kkristalblue Hola Niorma, please send all the details of your past booking your email address and your complete name by DM, We will check if itps possible. Thank you.

@tomaspmmx Hola, no tenemos reportadas incidencias web, has de ingresar al formulario de reclamaciones y aportar toda la información solicitada siguiendo los pasos: https://t.co/Lx7BTANBBO
 Reclamación/ motivo de reclamación: Cancelación de vuelo. Saludos

urls.title: Reclamaciones sobre el servicio - Iberia
urls.description: En nuestro centro de atención al cliente disponemos de un servicio de reclamaciones Iberia en el que responderemos a todas tus quejas y sugerencias

data.text: @willbeck1977 You're welcome, Will
@kabu_swe Hola William, we're sorry for the inconvenience and have just replied your DMs. Regards
@leah_andlit Hola Leah, sorry for the inconvenience. Could you send us a DM with your PIR reference number and full name? https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@diasporachick Hola, sorry to read this. You should have opened a PIR (property irregularity report) at the airport with the airline that operated the last flight in your itinerary. If you did this, please send us a DM with the PIR reference and your full name https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@AmandaM90946822 Hola, Amanda. Parabéns pelo seu aniversário! Assim que tivermos resposta por parte do departamento responsável, voltaremos a contatá-la via DM. Desculpe-nos pelo inconveniente
@aon_sceal Hola Derek, we replied to your DM. Regards.
@willbeck1977 Hola Will, could you send us the details by DM? Please let us know if you already filled our form to request it. Thank you.
@Danoelguapo Thank you.
@RMGinsberg Hola Ross, we replied to your DM. Regards.
@Danoelguapo Hola Dano, could you send us by a DM the PIR or report number, your complete name and your email address? Thank you. https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@harneswapnil7 Hola, How we can help you?
@klovebrooks Thank you.
@SashaEats Thank you Sasha . Kind regards :)

@indian_zoe We are sorry to read this, we suggest you to use the "Assistance" as claim, and you will be able to write all the situation of your case through the claim box, remember to add all documentation in order our colleagues be able to analyze. Regards
@klovebrooks Hola, we have responded to your DM, we remain attentive to your response, regards.
@indian_zoe Hola, we are sorry to hear that, we suggest you make a claim on our website so we can help you, regards. https://t.co/va7wYIeka5

urls.title: Complaints about service - Iberia
urls.description: Our Customer Service Centre includes an Iberia Complaints Service for handling customers' complaints and suggestions

data.text: @Seblechanoine Hola Sebastien, we have replied to your DM, well remain attentive to your response, regards.
@stacey_coster Hola Stacey, sorry we cannot inform you any different, we suggested you to contact our team at Serviberia, please try and do that for further help, regards.
@stacey_coster Stacey, we have responded to your DM, regards.

@AllenClingler Hola Allen, we are sorry to hear that, in principle we understand that if you booked with AA its necessary for you to contact them, but please send us a DM with your booking code, ticket number and full name so we can verify, thanks.

@JosePizarroB Hola Jose, remember that you can save your reservation to finish later, after selecting the flight you want to save, for a fee you can save it to finish paying it on the next 24 hours, regards.
@stacey_coster Stacey, we have responded to your DM, regards.
@stacey_coster Hola Stacey, could you please send us the details of your case so we can help you? On a DM facilitate us your booking code, ticket number and full name, thanks.

@SashaEats Hola Sasha. We are sorry to read about this, however, we do not know the details on your experience. If you wish, you can provide us  the details via direct message  https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa so we'd be able to consult from here. 
Kind Regards
@AllenClingler Hola Allen. Was the purchase through https://t.co/wCD0fEwHFh? Did you speak with our colleagues at the airport counters?

urls.title: Check-in and billing - Iberia
urls.description: With the Iberia check-in system, you'll save time from the word go. Enter to see all the information on how to check in correctly

data.text: @pianistas Hola Nikolaos. We remind you that online check-in opens 24 hours before departure. The boarding pass can be obtained free of charge at the airport counter on the day of the flight, as well as online check-in or through our app. Whether you can get it in advance or not /1

@Agosorge Hola Agostina. ¿Podrías enviarnos un mensaje directo https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6 con tu nombre completo, los detalles al respecto y así lo podemos verificar desde aquí? Muchas gracias. 
Quedamos a disposición. Un saludo

@edcanovas Hola Eduardo. No podríamos indicarte algo diferente desde este canal, si deseas consultar tus opciones y alternativas en base a la tarifa contratada, por favor consulta directamente con nuestra área de reservas https://t.co/cgjD3VAmFx . Un saludo,

urls.title: Oficinas de Iberia - Iberia
urls.description: Estamos a tu disposición en nuestra amplia red de oficinas.

data.text: @lauren_c_92 Hola Lauren. We have answered your direct message. Kind regards.
@PeetChelseapeet Hola Chelsea. We have answered your direct message informing you on how to proceed. Kind regards,
@kabu_swe Hola William. We answered your direct message, as we have mentioned, we have already escalated your case from this channel and we're currently waiting for an update. Kind regards,

@Xender_X Hola lo. You can fill a claim  https://t.co/qlaQPQxXaG our Customer Service Team will review what happened and they will contact you directly with a resolution. 
Kind Regards,

urls.title: Complaints about service - Iberia
urls.description: Our Customer Service Centre includes an Iberia Complaints Service for handling customers' complaints and suggestions

data.text:
@pdrodays Hola Pedro, we would like to have more information about the incident, could you send us a DM with all the details to review?. Kind regards.
https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@3_21esqui Entendemos tu molestias y te ofrecemos una disculpa por las molestias que se presentaron. Hemos respondido a tu consulta a través del MD que nos enviaste. Un saludo.

@alvarohmaliaga Hola Alvaro, we understand that you made your reservation through a travel agency, can you confirm? If so, we inform you that you must contact them to carry out any type of management. Kind regards.
@3_21esqui Hola. Sentimos lo que nos comentas. por favor envíanos un MD con todos los detalles de tu caso. Quedamos a tu disposición. Saludos.

@helmantica_agus Hola Agustin, we would like to have more information about the incident, could you send us a DM with all the details to review and tell you how to proceed?. Kind regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1UII

@ChrissyDee_3 Hola Chrissy, we can not see the format that you have credited us, we would like you to give us a screenshot of the error by DM as well as it is supposed to appear correctly instead. We were attentive by private means, regards.https://t.co/R34zzY1UII

@kevkader Hola, we have responded to your inquiry privately. At the moment we are still attentive to news, we suggest you keep an eye on your cell phone as well as email for any update. We remain at your disposal, regards.

domain.name: Business Taxonomy
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

entity.name: Technology Business
entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent related to softwares, apps, communication equipments, hardwares

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Category
domain.description: A grouping of interests and hobbies entities, like Novelty Food or Destinations

data.text: @RevDanAL Hola Dan, we have responded to your inquiry by DM. We remain attentive to your comments and remain at your disposal for any new queries, regards.

@fukawi2 Hola Phillip, we are sorry to read what you tell us. If you have had a problem with your flight we would like you to give us the details of your booking by DM. We are attentive to your comments, regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@madeloncreates Hola, we inform you that in this case you should not have problems with the personal accessory. In principle, if you have luggage in the cabin you should be entitled to a personal accessory, we are at your disposal for any new query. Regards

@marcponsc37 Aún así, esta la opción de que puedas consultar sobre tu caso puntual con nuestros amigos de WOOF Airlines https://t.co/qnwkqXI5uc para mas información en relación a tu mascota. Un saludo,

urls.title: Transporte de Perros en Avión | Expertos en transporte de perros
urls.description: ¿Necesitas llevar a tu perro en avión? Woof Airlines: servicio de transporte de perros en avión en vuelos Internacionales o Nacionales dentro de España.

data.text: @marcponsc37 Hola Marcponsc37. Sentimos leer acerca de esto, sin embargo, no podríamos indicarte algo diferente desde este canal.  La regulación máxima permitida para una mascota y por su seguridad es 45Kg (incluyendo su trasportín). /1

@fukawi2 Hola Phillip. Did you speak with our colleagues at the airport desks about this? Could you please provide us  the details via direct message  https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa ? 
Kind Regards

@FreshLemon310 Hola FreshLemon. Could you please provide us  the details via direct message  https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa with your full name and file number so we'd be able to consult from here? We remain at your disposal. 
Kind Regards
@neilio_uk Hello, Could you tell us the details and information of the flight by DM. Thank you.
@sallyccoz Hola Sally, we sent an email regarding your case. Regards.
@haligoner Déjanos saber por MD en caso de cualquier duda adicional para revisar e indicarte cómo proceder. Saludos. https://t.co/HyIAB5NZjE 2/

@haligoner Hola, te informamos que no tenemos reportada ninguna incidencia en nuestra web por el momento. Recuerda que las plazas de avión habilitadas para compra con Avios están sujetas a disponibilidad por lo que te sugerimos ampliar el rango de fechas asociado a tu búsqueda. 1/

@jackaspires Hello. Thanks for writing to us. If the connecting flight is in the same reservation as this flight, you could check the alternatives with the reservations area. please send us a DM with all the details. Kind regards.

@jackaspires Hola Jack. We are sorry to read about what happened. Please consult with our colleagues at the counters about the options available, they will verify the information and tell you how to proceed. Kind regards.
@ArielMWarren Hola Ariel, we have sent you an answer again in our conversation by direct message. Regards.

@stephashford Hola Stephanie, please clear the browser's memory cache or try again with a different browser or device. In case it doesn't work, send us a DM with your full name and booking reference code https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@fcsantin Hola Fabiano, we're sorry to read this. Could you please try to access the IBPlus account using our mobile app? If it doesn't work, please send us a DM with your account number, full name and email address https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@Cristina_I_Ferr Yes, our colleagues from the claims department will get back to you by email within 7 business days. We appreciate your patience. Best regards
@Cristina_I_Ferr We don't analyze complaints here on the social media department, so we kindly ask you to please wait for our colleague's' answer. Kind regards
@Cristina_I_Ferr please wait for the answer from the relevant department. Kind regards

@Cristina_I_Ferr Even if the Comfort fare details appear as default, you selected the Basic fare, which doesn't include checked bags, instead of the Comfort fare. So we're not able to add the bags free of charge. Since you already submitted a complaint, /1
@dsrain Hola Denise, please DM us with more details and the file number of your case, if you have one, so we can verify all the information. Regards. https://t.co/HyIAB5NZjE

@TucoParkland Hola, lamentamos escuchar lo que nos comentas. Entendemos que abriste la reclamación a través del formulario https://t.co/waZL0xzxKK; si es así, envíanos en un MD (https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6) el número de caso (E********-********) para poder verificar. Quedamos atentos, saludos.

urls.title: Reclamaciones sobre el servicio - Iberia
urls.description: En nuestro centro de atención al cliente disponemos de un servicio de reclamaciones Iberia en el que responderemos a todas tus quejas y sugerencias

data.text: @Cristina_I_Ferr As explained earlier, this isn't an error. You can alwas verify the other fares details even after you select the fare you want to pay for. The app clearly separates each fare and you can see that the checked bags are included on the Comfort fare, not on the Basic one

@dsrain Hola Denise, sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name, ticket number (075...) and the references related to the payments for the seat selection (07555...) https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6

@Cristina_I_Ferr This isn't an error, Cristina. After you select the fare that you want to pay for (red dot mark), you can always click on the arrows to check the details of the other fares without unselecting the fare you originally picked up. Sorry for the misunderstanding.
@Cristina_I_Ferr The fact that you chose to pay for the Basic fare doesn't prevent you from clicking on the arrows to check the details of the other fares. Sorry

@Cristina_I_Ferr The dot only means that you selected to pay for the Basic fare, but you clicked on the arrow to see the details of the Comfort fare instead. Here's a screenshot we just took, where you can see that the app is working fine https://t.co/zrvTZgVtbv

@tomaspmmx Hola Tomas, nuestros compañeros del departamento encargado están gestionando para re ubicar a todos los pasajeros en otros vuelos. Todas las actualizaciones las recibirás dándote de alta en Iberia conecta https://t.co/wxro6mFMXX, y recibirás un SMS o mail. Saludos.

@Cristina_I_Ferr We've just made a test and the app is working fine from our end. When we click on the basic fare, it shows the details related to such fare. As we can see, it looks like you clicked on the Comfort fare instead

@Cristina_I_Ferr We've just replied your DM, please check. The screenshots related to your complaint show that you selected the Basic fare, which doesn't include checked bags, but you verified the details of the Comfort fare, which includes baggage, instead of checking the details of the basic
@nyx_ia Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number (075...). https://t.co/R34zzY1UII
@nyx_ia Hola, sorry to read this. Unfortunately, the number of pets per flight is limited and, in order to cancel a booking, there's a 30 euros service fee per ticket.
@Cristina_I_Ferr Hola Cristina, sorry to read this. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and the screenshot you mentioned https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@kabu_swe Hola, we've sent you a new DM. Please check
@kabu_swe Hola William, we've just replied it. Kind regards

@dbattaglia1968 Hola Daniele, thank you for contacting us, could you please give us by DM the following information in order to help you. 1, booking code 2, ticket number 075- , 3, EMD upgrade number: 075-55  4, registered email. Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@Susan939503 Hola Susan, sentimos leer lo que comentas, necesitamos que nos envíes detalles por DM del PIR, número de reclamación de equipaje, datos personales asociados al mismo y cualquier otra información que dispongas. Saludos
@Bethnalboi64 You're welcome  Beth :)
@EricTrichot Hola, Iberia doit suivre la loi espagnole. Et à cet égard, la loi espagnole dit que la masque est toujours obligatoire sur les moyens de transport. Merci.
@kabu_swe Hola William, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us by DM your PIR code and full passenger name to verify the information? Regards.
@MBorodovskiy Hola, we don´t know the details of what happened, please send a DM with more information so we can help you. We remain at your disposal, regards
@EnjoyingItMore Hola. How can we help you? Let us know the details of your query by DM to review. Regards

@beltranmaria961 Hola. ¿Podrías por favor, dejarnos saber el código de reclamación original a través de MD (https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6) para que podamos revisarlo? Los códigos de reclamación de Iberia son similares a este ejemplo: E20160928-01234567. Quedamos a tu disposición. Saludos.
@PilarArandaP Maria, we are sorry we can not tell you something different.
